description: A major visual and technical overhaul for a smoother, more reliable experience.
changelog:
• Complete UI Redesign: Modern cards, floating search, and smoother layouts.
• New Advanced Debug Screen: Catch and report errors instantly.
• Improved Update System: Never miss a version with our new update dialog.
• Enhanced Bottom Menu: Quick access to About, Favorites, and Scripts.
• Performance optimizations and minor bug fixes.
